argumentText:
ARGUMENT
l w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfwrd.1 | |- F/_ x S |
| 2 |  | #P_df-word | |- Word S = { w | E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S } |
| 3 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x NN0 |
| 4 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x w |
| 5 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x ( 0 ..^ l ) |
| 6 | 4, 5, 1 | #P_nff | |- F/ x w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S |
| 7 | 3, 6 | #P_nfrex | |- F/ x E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nfab | |- F/_ x { w | E. l e. NN0 w : ( 0 ..^ l ) --> S } |
| 9 | 2, 8 | #P_nfcxfr | |- F/_ x Word S |
